meanings.definition: The act of passengers exiting an aircraft.
meanings.sent1: After the flight, the deplaning of passengers began slowly.
meanings.sent2: The deplaning process was quick and efficient at the airport.
meanings.sent3: During deplaning, some passengers were excited to finally stretch their legs.
meanings.sent4: The deplaning of passengers resembled a well-organized parade.
meanings.sent5: The flight attendant announced the deplaning procedure clearly to all passengers.

meanings.definition: The process of disembarking from a plane.
meanings.sent1: Deplaning from the aircraft was a relief after the long flight.
meanings.sent2: Passengers were instructed to remain seated during deplaning.
meanings.sent3: As the deplaning started, some passengers couldn't wait to get off the plane.
meanings.sent4: The deplaning process felt like a slow-motion movie scene.
meanings.sent5: The captain announced the deplaning gate for passengers to exit the plane.
